thread.title: Last minute student finance webchat: as it happened
thread.title_full: Last minute student finance webchat: as it happened - Telegraph

author: Josie Gurney-Read , Online Education Editor
title: Last minute student finance webchat: as it happened
text: A Results Day webchat was held here on August 13th, with Mark Lee Kelly from the Student Loans Company dealing with students questions. Student finance is probably the last thing you want to deal with right now, but along with accommodation it's the main piece of pre-university admin you will need to have sorted before heading off. It might seem daunting, but getting student finance right from the outset will make your university experience far less stressful. Replay our webchat to see what other students asked, and hopefully you will find some answers for yourself. Useful links: • Student finance: how to apply for last minute funding • Clearing 2015: guide to last minute accommodation • Student finance: loans, schemes and bursaries @telegraph
